item.title: 425: Amstrad CPC 40th Anniversary with Roland Perry Pt 1 – The Retro Hour EP425
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Join us on a special journey back in time with Roland Perry, the visionary tech consultant behind the legendary Amstrad CPC, as we celebrate 40 incredible years of this iconic machine. In this not-to-be-missed episode, Roland takes us from his early days tinkering with electronics in school, through the founding of Ambit International, right up […]
item.content:encoded:
Join us on a special journey back in time with Roland Perry, the visionary tech consultant behind the legendary Amstrad CPC, as we celebrate 40 incredible years of this iconic machine. In this not-to-be-missed episode, Roland takes us from his early days tinkering with electronics in school, through the founding of Ambit International, right up to his crucial role in steering the Amstrad CPC to success against heavyweights like the ZX Spectrum and Commodore 64. 

Contents:

00:00 – The Week’s Retro News Stories
45:20 – Roland Perry Interview

Amstrad Addict Magazine: https://www.pixel.addict.media/shop/amstrad-addict-magazine

item.title: 426: Amstrad CPC with Roland Perry Pt 2: The Sinclair Takeover, Expanding the Range – The Retro Hour EP426
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: We continue our celebrations of 40 years of the Amstrad CPC with part 2 of our chat with Roland Perry. This episode dives into the Sinclair acquisition, the transformation of Amstrad after incorporating the Spectrum, the expansion of the CPC line into high-end models, and a peek at some intriguing unreleased prototypes. Contents: 00:00 – […]
item.content:encoded:
We continue our celebrations of 40 years of the Amstrad CPC with part 2 of our chat with Roland Perry.  This episode dives into the Sinclair acquisition, the transformation of Amstrad after incorporating the Spectrum, the expansion of the CPC line into high-end models, and a peek at some intriguing unreleased prototypes.

Contents:

00:00 – The Week’s Retro News Stories
42:36 – Roland Perry Interview

item.title: 424: From Harvester to Midway with Lee Jacobson – The Retro Hour EP424
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: This week, we have a virtual sit-down with Lee Jacobson, the creative force behind the cult classic dark adventure game ‘Harvester’ and the groundbreaking ‘Command Adventures: Starship’ and the B-movie style 1994 FPS ‘The Fortress of Dr. Radiaki’, sharing behind-the-scenes tales from the early days of FPS and adventure games. Contents: 00:00 – The Week’s […]
item.content:encoded:
This week, we have a virtual sit-down with Lee Jacobson, the creative force behind the cult classic dark adventure game ‘Harvester’ and the groundbreaking ‘Command Adventures: Starship’ and the B-movie style 1994 FPS ‘The Fortress of Dr. Radiaki’, sharing behind-the-scenes tales from the early days of FPS and adventure games. 

Contents:

00:00 – The Week’s Retro News Stories
43:59 – Lee Jacobson Interview

item.title: Screen Graphics 64(1983)(Abacus)
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Screen Graphics 64 Screen Graphics 64 is an extension software written by Roy Wainwright of Abacus Software. It adds 24 graphics commands to Commodore 64 BASIC. These include switching to high resolution and multicolour screens, sprite manipulation tools, and commands for drawing pixels, lines, boxe…. This item belongs to: software/softwarelibrary_c64_applications. This item has files of […]
item.content:encoded:
Screen Graphics 64 Screen Graphics 64 is an extension software written by Roy Wainwright of Abacus Software. It adds 24 graphics commands to Commodore 64 BASIC. These include switching to high resolution and multicolour screens, sprite manipulation tools, and commands for drawing pixels, lines, boxe….

This item belongs to: software/softwarelibrary_c64_applications.

This item has files of the following types: Archive BitTorrent, Emulator Screenshot, Item Tile, JPEG Thumb, Metadata, PNG, Unknown
